name: Niño
description:
Game Description

In this Twin-Stick Shooter, you play as Niño, a young brave boy who wants to protect his village.

You need to get rid of Lord Guacamolé, a rich businessman who tries to destroy  local restaurants in order to establish his restaurant empire in every corners of the world.

Context

The game is themed  around my passion for food. 

I made every assets except the sounds in this game.

***There's a couple things that needs to be fix before it's definitive release.
